name: Nivea Verzachtende Reinigingsmelk
composition: Ingredients: Aqua, Isopropyl Palmitate, Paraffinum Liquidum, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Cetyl Alcohol, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil, Oleic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Arachidic Acid, Myristic Acid, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Limonene, Citronellol, Parfum
